page.title: 17MY FAVOURITE FOOD
page.content: CLAIRE:My favourite food is salad cream sandwiches.I like them with a thick layer of salad cream in the centre.I have them everyday. DEAN: My favourite foods are hamburgers ,because they are juicy and meaty,and fish and chips,especially fish without bones.The latter is lovely with a 'wally'_gherkin.The foods I hate most are tomatoes and mushrooms.Tomatoes are slimey inside and mushrooms go a dark colour when cooked. KELLIE: My favourite dinners are Christmas dinner and Sunday dinner_turkey,chicken and roast beef oozing with juice with nice crispy roast potatoes_yum,yum.But as for peas and runner beans_no,I don't like them.My favourite drink is coke and I also like ice cream and apple pie and cream_delicious!
